pages.title: SentinelCase: Enhanced Audit Logging
pages.content: Forensic-Grade Accountability for High-Trust Moderation

pages.title: Contents
pages.content: 1. Audit Trail Foundation; 2. Comprehensive Data Capture; 3. Action Catalog; 4. Privacy & IP Management; 5. Real-Time Monitoring; 6. Security Architecture

pages.title: 01: Audit Trail Foundation
pages.content: Understanding the forensic-grade logging infrastructure that underpins platform accountability

pages.title: Forensic-Grade Audit Trail
pages.content: This page establishes the core value proposition of SentinelCase's audit system, explaining how every interaction is captured with forensic precision to ensure complete accountability and transparency for moderation teams.

pages.title: 02: Comprehensive Data Capture
pages.content: Examining the detailed data points recorded for every platform action

pages.title: Logged Data Elements
pages.content: This page details the specific data points captured for each action: IP addresses, precise timestamps with timezone data, staff account identifiers, action classifications, and associated case references, demonstrating the comprehensive nature of the audit trail.

pages.title: Data Capture Architecture
pages.content: This page visualizes how data elements are structured and linked within the audit system, showing the relationship between user sessions, actions, and case entities through a technical diagram that illustrates the data model's sophistication.

pages.title: 03: Action Catalog
pages.content: Comprehensive inventory of all tracked user activities and system events

pages.title: Logged Actions Overview
pages.content: This page presents the complete spectrum of logged activities, categorized into authentication events, case management operations, evidence handling, user moderation actions, and system administration tasks, demonstrating the platform's exhaustive monitoring capabilities.

pages.title: Action Categories & Frequency
pages.content: This page visualizes the distribution and frequency of different action types, providing insight into platform usage patterns and highlighting which moderation activities generate the highest audit volumes, helping teams understand operational patterns.

pages.title: 04: Privacy & IP Management
pages.content: Balancing forensic requirements with user privacy protection

pages.title: IP Visibility & Privacy Framework
pages.content: This page explains the tiered access control system for IP address data, detailing how information is masked for general staff while providing full visibility to administrators, and clarifying the legitimate use cases for IP data in security and investigations.

pages.title: Privacy Controls & Data Access
pages.content: This page illustrates the technical and procedural safeguards that prevent unauthorized IP data access, including role-based permissions, audit logs for IP data viewing, and the strict policies governing when and how IP information can be accessed.

pages.title: 05: Real-Time Monitoring
pages.content: Live integration capabilities and external system notifications

pages.title: Discord Webhook Integration
pages.content: This page details the extended webhook functionality that enables real-time monitoring through Discord, specifying the data payload structure including action types, staff identifiers, masked IP information, timestamps, and case references.

pages.title: Webhook Configuration & Security
pages.content: This page provides the technical implementation details for webhook integration, including the target endpoint configuration, payload formatting, and security considerations for external system integration.

pages.title: 06: Security Architecture
pages.content: Advanced protection mechanisms ensuring audit integrity

pages.title: Security Summary
pages.content: This page synthesizes the platform's security features: immutable timestamped records that prevent tampering, IP-based anomaly detection for identifying suspicious activity, comprehensive staff accountability through individual action tracking, and the overall system design optimized for high-trust moderation environments.

pages.title: Immutable Records & Anomaly Detection
pages.content: This page explains the technical mechanisms that ensure audit trail integrity, including cryptographic timestamping, tamper-evident logging structures, and the algorithms used to detect unusual patterns that might indicate security threats or policy violations.

pages.title: Trust Through Transparency
pages.content: SentinelCase's enhanced audit logging establishes a new standard for accountability in moderation platforms, providing forensic-grade documentation that protects both users and staff while enabling effective governance.
